description: Authors use StoryMill project files to compile all book information together. After a book has been drafted, they can publish the novel to several different file formats, including .PDF , .DOCX , .DOC , .HTML , .RTF , .RTFD , and .WEBARCHIVE .

Mariner Software introduced the STORYMILL extension with StoryMill 3.0.2. StoryMill projects previously used the .AVENIRPROJ extension. Both file types can be used interchangeably with current software versions.
NOTE: Mariner Software discontinued the development of StoryMill.
